    • Constructor Detail

      • Configuration

        public Configuration(boolean multipleThreads,
                     int maxNoOfThreads,
                     int maxQueueSize,
                     int timeout,
                     boolean ignoreTimeoutError,
                     int maxRetryAttempts,
                     boolean sDCacheMode,
                     boolean sDCacheShared,
                     int sDCacheTimeout,
                     int sDCacheSize)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        multipleThreads - use single thread or multiple threads
        maxNoOfThreads - the max number of multiple threads to be used
        maxQueueSize - the max queue size
        timeout - the max responsible time for services
        ignoreTimeoutError - true if ignoring timeout error, otherwise false
        maxRetryAttempts - the max number of retry attempts
        sDCacheMode - the mode to fetch the available services, from the local cache or from the service registry
        sDCacheShared - allow multiple threads to share the same cache or not
        sDCacheTimeout - the refresh period for the cache
        sDCacheSize - the max cache size

      • Configuration

        public Configuration(boolean multipleThreads,
                     int maxNoOfThreads,
                     int maxQueueSize)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        multipleThreads - use single thread or multiple threads
        maxNoOfThreads - the max number of multiple threads to be used
        maxQueueSize - the max queue size
